skins.shipDescription: Nevada-class battleship ¨C Oklahoma, Hull Number BB-37!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Oklahoma of the Nevada class. I served in both the Atlantic and Pacific fleets... I even bore the duty of engaging in 'friendly' diplomacy!
skins.acquisition: Commander... eh, ah... I'm sorry! I was stunned just by looking at you... Ah, no, no... Nice to meet you! I'm Oklahoma!
skins.login: Commander~ Please work hard with me today as well~
skins.details: Huh? What are you looking at? Is there something on my face?
skins.secretaryIdle1: If I don't do something soon, everyone will laugh about the 'Bantry Bay Squadron' again!
skins.secretaryIdle2: In two years... no, one year, I will surpass my sister for sure!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, I will always listen to your troubles if you have any, you hear?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, your hand feels comforting to me...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Whaa?! Geez... My heart wasn't ready for this...

skins.shipDescription: Thanks a ton, Commander. With my new strength, do you think I've managed to catch up to my sister a little? Ehehe, for your sake, I'll work even harder!
skins.acquisition: Thanks a ton, Commander. With my new strength, do you think I've managed to catch up to my sister a little? Ehehe, for your sake, I'll work even harder!
skins.login: Howdy, Commander~ Are you doin' well?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, how about we hold a Fleet Problem? I'm pretty good at those~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, wanna go riding with me? We can both ride the same horse, hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hey Commander, you gotta hear this! I just scored a win against my sister! Yaaay~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Hmm? What's up, Commander? Do you need my help? Sure~ just leave it to me!
